documentation.xhtml:p: This is a rounding function which returns the biggest possible integer which is less or equal to X. floor2(3.14) = 3 floor2(-3.14) = -4
modulo funtion for real numbers modr(5.5,2.5) = 0.5

ST.xhtml:p: RAD := modR(0.0174532925199433 * _deg , 6.283185307179586476); (* from OSCAT library; www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function converts Radiant to degrees
this function converts degrees into Radiant execution time
INTERLOCK has two inputs I1 and I2 which drive the corresponding outputs Q1 and Q2

ST.xhtml:p:
LEAP_DAY := IDATE MOD UDINT#126230400 = UDINT#68169600;
(* From OSCAT LIBRARY, www.oscat.de *)

YEAR_END := DWORD_TO_UDINT(SHR(UDINT_TO_DWORD(INT_TO_UDINT(y) * UDINT#1461 - UDINT#2876712), 2)) * UDINT#86400;
(* From OSCAT LIBRARY, www.oscat.de *)

MONTH_END := SET_DATE(YEAR_OF_DATE(idate),MONTH_OF_DATE(idate)+1,1) - UDINT#86400;
(* From OSCAT LIBRARY, www.oscat.de *)

DATE_TO_DT := IN;
(* From OSCAT LIBRARY, www.oscat.de *)

YEAR_OF_DATE := UDINT_TO_INT((IDATE+UDINT#43200) / UDINT#31557600 + UDINT#1970);
(* From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: returs the year of a date the function works for dates from 1970 - 2099
this function loads a bit into a byte at position pos.

ST.xhtml:p:
BIT_OF_DWORD := (SHR(in,N) AND 16#00000001) > 0;
(* From Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function extracts a single bit from the nth position from right (right is lowest bit the lowest Bit (Bit0 from in) is selected with N=.
MANUAL_2 is a manual override for boolean signals
this is an intelligent dimmer interface with an autoset feature for "in" it will automatically detect the type of switch:
calculates the day of the year

ST.xhtml:p:
LEAP_OF_DATE := SHL(UDINT_TO_DWORD((idate + UDINT#43200) / UDINT#31557600), 30) = DWORD#16#80000000;
(* From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: leap_of_date is true if current year is a leap year
returns the mid value of 3 real inputs
multi_in is a signal conditioning function which can be configured in 8 different ways.

ST.xhtml:p:
DT_TO_TOD_2 := (IN MOD UDINT#86400) * UDINT#1000;
(* From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de *)

DT_TO_DATE_2 := (IN / UDINT#86400) * UDINT#86400;
(* From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: Zeitanteil aus Date-Time herausfiltern
returns the day OF month for any DATE
returns the current month of the year
creates a date output from year, month and day of month
CIRCLE_SEG calculates the Area of a circle segement enclosed between a sectant line and the circumference
TONOF generated a TON and TOF Delay for the Input N TON (T1) and TOF (T2) can be configured separately
This is a increment function which increments the variable X by 1 and if N is reached, it begins with 0 instead of N again.
FILTER_I is a low pass filter

ST.xhtml:p:
_DT_TO_DATE := (IN / UDINT#86400) * UDINT#86400;
(* From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: Zeitanteil aus Date-Time herausfiltern

ST.xhtml:p:
TIME_TO_TOD := DWORD_TO_UDINT(TIME_TO_DWORD(IN));
(* From OSCAT LIBRARY, www.oscat.de *)

_DT_TO_TOD := (IN MOD UDINT#86400) * UDINT#1000;
(* From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de *)

TOD_TO_TIME := DWORD_TO_TIME(UDINT_TO_DWORD(IN));
(* From OSCAT LIBRARY, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: hysteresis function switches the output high
integrate is a plain integrator with I/O for out
R2_set sets a double precision real to a single real value
R2_add adds a real to a double real which extends the accuracy of a real to twice as many digits
FT_int2 is an integrator with input IN and factor K.

LINEAR_INT calculates an output based on a linear interpolation of up to 20 coordinates given in an array the input coordinates have to start at the lowest array position and must be sorted ba ascending X values.

ST.xhtml:p:
F_TO_C := (fahrenheit - 32.0) * 0.5555555555555;
(* From OSCAT Library, www.OSCAT.de *)

C_TO_F := celsius * 1.8 + 32.0;
(* From OSCAT Library, www.OSCAT.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function converts celsius to fahrenheit

ST.xhtml:p: exp10 := EXP(X * 2.30258509299405); (* from OSCAT library; www.OSCAT.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: calculates the exponent to the basis 10
ONTIME measures the ontime of a signal in seconds
trend_DW analyses the trend of a input signal.
_RMP_NEXT will generate a ramp output following the input IN.
BAND_B will limit X to B
this function calculates a ramp and limits the output to 0 .. 255 without overflow problems
this ramp generator generates a byte wide ramp with 255 steps the generator has an asynchronous set and reset
_RMP_B generates a ramp on an external var of type byte
GEN_PULSE uses the internal sps timer to generate a continuous output waveform with programmable high and low time.
Output current execution time in miliseconds
this is an intelligent actuator interface for any 2point actuator
actuator_3P is an interface for a 3 point actuator
ACTUATOR_A drives any valve or similar with 0 - 100% analog control
this is an intelligent actuator interface for any coil actuator
actuator_pump is a pump interface which can be controlled by an input in and an input manual
out_ud is a up/dn or Right/left locked output driver

ST.xhtml:p:
AIR_DENSITY := 101325.0 * (1.0 - RH * SDD(_T, TRUE) * 3.773319E-3 / P) / (287.05 * ( _T - -273.15));
(* From OSCAT Library, www.OSCAT.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function calculates the air density between 0 and 100 deg C
this function calculates the vapor saturation pressure
this function calculates the enthalpy for humid air
this function calculates the water concentratin in air
this function block controls a hot water boiler
burner ist eine Oel-Brenner_steuerung fuer nichtmodulierende Oelbrenner

ST.xhtml:p:
DEW_RH := LIMIT(0.0, VC / DEW_CON(1.0, _T), 100.0);
(* From OSCAT Library, www.OSCAT.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function calculates the relative humidity
this function calculates the dew point
this function calculates the heat index temperature
this function calculates the water density
Heat_Temp calculates a heat characteristic based on the formula
Legionella is a complete sequencer for up to 8 hot water lines that need to be sterilzed periodically
this function retruns true if the daytime TD is between start and stop
this is a simple timer that generates an output pulse on selected days

ST.xhtml:p:
DAY_OF_WEEK := UDINT_TO_INT((idate / UDINT#86400 + UDINT#3) MOD UDINT#7) + INT#01;
(* From OSCAT Library, www.OSCAT.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function calculates the vapor saturation pressure for NH3 gas
this function calculates the vapor saturation temperature for NH3 gas
TANK_VOL1 calculates the volume of a tubular tank filled to level H
TANK_VOL2 calculates the volume of a spherical tank filled to level H
temp_ext measures and processes ext temperature
water_cp calculates the specific heat capacity of liquid water
this function calculates the wind chill temperature
click checks an input for single, double or tripple click
SW_reconfig detects if an input is high or low active and debounces the input
click_mode decodes an input for single, double or long click
DEBOUNCE is used to debounce switch inputs
this is an intelligent dimmer interface with an autoset feature
F_Lamp is an interface to flourescent lamps
Pulse_length indicates on 3 outputs
PULSE_T generates a pulse of length T2 if the input pulse is shorter than T1
this is an intelligent switch interface
this timer generated programmabe output pulses per day, week, month
TIMER_EXT is a twilight timer
